description.p: Refreshes one or more Expanding Menu controls.

argument.name: ids
argument.description: A comma delimited list of Expanding Menu Control ids.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.refreshExpandingMenuData()]* method can be used to refresh multiple [Expanding Menu Controls] in a component. An Ajax Callback is made to refresh the data. If security or server-side show/hide expressions were defined for menu items, these expressions will be re-evaluated when the Expanding Menu Control is refreshed.
